comments.body: awesome test! Do you know what scenarios can cause this issue?
Yes. In `runner.run()`, if the call to `_handleToolError()` in the catch block throws an exception, it will be caught by the `onError` callback to `runZoned()`.
I'm looking at the implementation of `_handleToolError()`. It looks like some state changed between the two invocations to `_handleToolError()`?
